title: Magdahlia's Medallion
description: Transported to the strange and unpredictable world of Anathema, Alicia searches for Magdahlia's medallion - a medallion with the power to open portals to other worlds. Broken into four pieces, each piece is protected by riddles that only one not from Anathema can solve.Others have tried and failed.But Alicia has something they didn't - a journal that documents the secrets of the medallion. Pursued by animals, wolfmen, Krilrogs - evil creatures created from the Queen of Drathsmyr's black magic experiments, Alicia undertakes a dangerous journey over icy mountains and stormy seas, through dark forests and savage jungles.Chosen by the immortal twins, Magdahlia and Quinnisha to fulfill a prophecy, Alicia is gifted the ability to communicate with animals, trained as a warrior, and taught the arts of white magic.Will she accept her destiny, channel her inner strength and the power of the medallion, and defeat the wicked Queen before her control spreads to other worlds?Alicia's actions will determine not only her fate, but the fate of the people of Anathema.
author: Tricia Sheridan
